title: pyinstaller
extract: pyinstaller myscript.py. or with a few added options, for example a windowed application as a single-file executable, pyinstaller –onefile –windowed myscript.py. You distribute the bundle as a folder or file to other people, and they can execute your program. To your users, the app is self-contained.
extract_html: pyinstaller myscript.py. or with a few added options, for example a windowed application as a single-file executable, pyinstaller –onefile –windowed myscript.py. You distribute the bundle as a folder or file to other people, and they can execute your program. To your users, the app is self-contained.
